workshop.name: Workshop
workshop.description: The Workshop is the place where you can repair items, sell tiered items and transmogrify items... all in one spot! - Transmogrifications require scented candles produced and sold by Hagatha. - Four Tier III items gives you Pulsating Shard. - Two Rare Items give you a random Rare Item.

patron_shrine.name: Altar of Altruism
patron_shrine.description: Patrons can activate this shrine to grant buffs to the whole server. If you wish to change what messages the patron shrine sends you or toggle what effects you want to get, interact with it and select options.  Region 3 Patreon Shrine

newantium.name: New Antium
newantium.description: The remnants of a thriving civilization, bound by hunger and haunted by shades. Coordinates: ★ x=-449 y=181 z=-75

teleport_hub.name: R3 Teleport Hub
teleport_hub.description: Fast travel to towns, plots, dungeons and more!  Region 3 Teleport Hub

infusion.name: Infusion Altar
infusion.description: The technique to imbue power into equipment, will allow you to strengthen your gear and trascend mortal limits.

root.name: The Architect's Ring
root.description: A secluded and isolated land, hidden away from the rest of the world.

galengarde.name: Galengarde
galengarde.description: A safe haven for the Dichen and capital of the region, established around a colossal tree. Coordinates: ★ x=-304 y=83 z=-655

academy.name: The Professor
academy.description: Here you can select and change your class / specialization at any time. Learn more on how you can further increase your combat capabilities with The Professor via skill enhancements!

library.name: Library
library.description: Consult the Seanchaidh to reveal your fate. Come here to obtain a bounty and conquer it for unique rewards!

fatekeeper.name: Fatekeeper
fatekeeper.description: Check with the Fatekeeper to determine your destiny. You can change your overworld delve modifiers with the Fatekeeper.

casino.name: Sticks and Stones Tavern
casino.description: A Casino in an unlikely place, ran by an even more unlikely staff. Every Casino Chip grants a prize, try your hand at obtaining the Epic Consumables!

portmanteau.name: Port Manteau
portmanteau.description: A picturesque fishing town on the northern coast of the Wolfswood, overlooked by the capital. Coordinates: ★ x=-458 y=46 z=-916

masterworkanvil.name: Masterwork Anvil
masterworkanvil.description: The Masterwork Anvil is a new system to awaken your equipment's true capabilities using rare materials related to the item's origins.

molta.name: Molta
molta.description: A mining town amidst the ruins of other expeditions Coordinates: ★ x=206 y=103 z=80

repairstations.name: Ronevo's Repairs and Recycling
repairstations.description: The dwelling of Repairman Ronevo. You can repair items here, as well as sell tiered items.

root.name: The Celsian Isles
root.description: A large archipelago, split between frost and flame.

infusion.name: Infusion Altar
infusion.description: This invention of a long lost civilization will enable you to strengthen your equipment.

steelmeld.name: Steelmeld
steelmeld.description: An isolated underwater base built from an unknown time Coordinates: ★ x=-584 y=8 z=-474

nightroost.name: Nightroost
nightroost.description: A hilltop village ravaged by a threat still looming Coordinates: ★ x=-1315 y=129 z=513

wispervale.name: Wispervale
wispervale.description: A town of magic in a culture where magic is shunned Coordinates: ★ x=-1760 y=132 z=-16

docks.name: Mistport Docks
docks.description: A multitude of ships dock here, including a ship carrying a mystical Seer who can tell you your fate. The dock ships will depart and new ships will lay anchor over time.

monument.name: The Monument of the Isles
monument.description: As with before, six powerful Wool blocks must be placed atop this hallowed altar. Scour the dungeons of the Celsian Isles to Complete the Monument!  Region 2 Wool Monument

mistport.name: Mistport
mistport.description: A small haven of piracy and lawlessness Coordinates: ★ x=-763 y=84 z=1321

frostgate.name: Frostgate
frostgate.description: An oceanside citadel and capital of the Chillwind Empire Coordinates: ★ x=-1519 y=98 z=968

transmog.name: Transmogrifier
transmog.description: The Transmogrifier can be used to recycle unwanted items into something more useful! - Transmogrifications require a Magma Crystal or greater in order to use. - Four Tier V items give you Pulsating Powder. - Two Rare items give you a random Rare item.

casino.name: Monarch's Cozy Casino
casino.description: Every Casino Chip grants a prize, some more fabulous than others. Comfortably try your hand to get the Epic Frost Giant's Crown!

breachpoint.name: Breachpoint
breachpoint.description: An underwater outpost built to investigate the depths of the world Coordinates: ★ x=-702 y=10 z=-186

alnera.name: Alnera
alnera.description: The bustling capital of the Ishnir Empire Coordinates: ★ x=352 y=84 z=765

rahkeri.name: Rahkeri
rahkeri.description: A trade town now used as a vantage point for military operations Coordinates: ★ x=-121 y=166 z=449

patron_shrine.name: Pedestal o' Patrons
patron_shrine.description: Patrons can activate this shrine to grant buffs to the whole server. If you wish to change what messages the patron shrine sends you or toggle what effects you want to get, interact with it and select options.  Region 2 Patreon Shrine

teleport_hub.name: Seascour Trading Hub
teleport_hub.description: Fast travel to towns, plots, dungeons and more!  Region 2 Teleport Hub

carnival.name: The Floating Carnival
carnival.description: Exchange your Tier 2 through Tier 4 items for Carnival Tokens to play minigames and win prizes!

seashelltrader.name: Shipwreck Seeker
seashelltrader.description: An avid diver who has built up a collection of relics. He's willing to trade them for Gleaming Seashells.

academy.name: The Teacher's Domain
academy.description: Here you can change your class and skills at any time. The Teacher may also help you unlock new abilities to empower your class.

blackmarket.name: King Barbossa's Black Market
blackmarket.description: Find salvage traders from cities across the Isles selling Unique items thought lost.  Region 2 Unique Buybacks

delveinfusion.name: Delve Infusion Station
delveinfusion.description: A curious machine that allows you to further enhance your equipment.

highwatch.name: Highwatch
highwatch.description: A fortified keep protecting a mystical structure Coordinates: ★ x=1190 y=137 z=-114

apartment.name: Apartments
apartment.description: For a small amount of XP, you can get three Ender Chest Expansions for all your storage needs. Also the home of the snowman embassy.

circus.name: Dr Volkamph's Circus
circus.description: Trade your Tier 1 through 5 for circus tickets! Save up for animal spawn eggs and the Epic King's Sabatons!

infusion.name: Infusion Altar
infusion.description: Hidden away in the city of Ta'Eldim, this sacred altar can make your equipment stronger.

hotsprings.name: Hot Springs
hotsprings.description: Give yourself a glowing aura, cleanse yourself and arrows of effects, or just relax and rejuvenate in the mystical Ta'Eldim hot springs.

sierhaven.name: Sierhaven
sierhaven.description: The shining capital of the King's Valley Coordinates: ★ x=-766 y=107 z=72

oceangate.name: Oceangate
oceangate.description: A mighty bastion guarding the route from the Valley Coordinates: ★ x=-1634 y=122 z=98

monument.name: The Monument of the Valley
monument.description: Five wools with magical properties must be found, one in each of the Region 1 Wool Dungeons. To reach Region 2, you need to Complete the Monument.  Region 1 Wool Monument

city_guide.name: City Guide
city_guide.description: She has maps and survival gear all for free in the Sierhaven plaza, with the P.E.B. Station and the Nexus entrance nearby.

season_pass.name: Seasonal Pass Hub
season_pass.description: This room serves as the hub for the amazing Seasonal Pass events that are run regularly in Monumenta.

root.name: The King's Valley
root.description: A luxuriant landscape, scarred from a recent war.

teleport_hub.name: The King's Station
teleport_hub.description: Fast travel to towns, plots, dungeons and more!  Region 1 Teleport Hub

herald.name: King's Herald
herald.description: Every day the Herald offers a bounty in a POI. Complete the bounty, then talk to the Herald for your reward. The harder the POI, the better the reward. There are two available bounties a day on weekends.

lowtide.name: Lowtide
lowtide.description: A quaint lakeside town beside a massive seagate Coordinates: ★ x=715 y=74 z=483

ctaz.name: C'Taz
ctaz.description: A Tlaxan shaman, known for brewing elixirs and potions. Coordinates: ★ x=240 y=78 z=303

crafter.name: Crafter
crafter.description: Guarded by the Tlaxans, these devices allow crafting items that can't be obtained in any other way.

nyr.name: Nyr
nyr.description: A small town overlooking a scorched battleground Coordinates: ★ x=-141 y=95 z=-79

transmog.name: Transmogrifier
transmog.description: The Transmogrifier can be used to recycle unwanted items into something more useful! - Transmogrifications require a Power Crystal or greater in order to use. - Four Tier V items give you Pulsating Dust. - Two Rare items give you a random Rare item.

taeldim.name: Ta'Eldim
taeldim.description: A hidden sanctuary of the Tlaxan people Coordinates: ★ x=480 y=191 z=-349

castle.name: Castle Narsen
castle.description: Here you can found or join a guild, purchase a plot, see all our patrons, get info about Team Monumenta, or meet the King of the Narsens.

casino.name: Rock's Little Casino
casino.description: Every Casino Chip grants a prize, some more fabulous than others - none moreso than the Epic King's Warden!

patron_shrine.name: Shrine to the Benevolent
patron_shrine.description: Patrons can activate this shrine to grant buffs to the whole server. and can apply stat tracking to their items at the nearby Sierhaven Tracker. If you wish to change what messages the patron shrine sends you or toggle what effects you want to get, interact with it and select options.  Region 1 Patreon Shrine

academy.name: Narsen Academy
academy.description: Here you may change your class and skills at any time. If you're looking for a quest, Sybil may be able to point you in the right direction.

farr.name: Farr
farr.description: A Narsen town built from ruins of Tlaxan architecture Coordinates: ★ x=569 y=98 z=189
